info.sourceTextContent: Con esta novedad mandó inmediatamente el General batir tiendas, para transportarse con todo el ejército al pueblo de Tinta, donde halló el retrato del principal rebelde pendiente de la horca, sin averiguar el autor de aquella accion.
info.suspiciousTextContent: With this new beat immediately sent General stores, to transport all the army to the town of Tinta, where he found the portrait of the slope of the main rebel gallows, without finding out the author of that action
